Notice of Enrollment to Submit Internshi.details:
Attn : 2026 Graduating Batch B.Tech Students
Sub: Enrollment to Submit Internship Work mapped to Project – I of 7th Semester
This is to inform all the above students that there is a scope for mapping of Internship work against Project – I of 7th Semester.
The eligibility criteria of mapping the internship work are mentioned below:
All ongoing On/Off campus internship (No MoU’s required).
Student must have a valid internship Offer Letter (No email copies will be considered).
Student must have been issued a No Objection Certificate (NOC) from the office of T&P.
